item.title: Setra 531 DT v7.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 19, 2025

Setra 531 DT v7.0 ETS2

V7
Cabin renewed.
Front bumper renewed.
Front and rear headlights renewed.
New slotted mirror added.

V6
Mirrors remodeled.
Reversing camera fixed.
New engine sound added.

V5
Reversing Camera Added.(Works when in Reverse Gear in Automatic Shift Option)
White Console and Steering Wheel Cover Added.
Red console and steering wheel cover added.
Orange Console and Steering Wheel Covering Added.
Flag Accessory Added to Console.
Label Accessories Added.
Tachograph and Other Vehicles Added.
Fixed the problem of luggage not changing the licence plate.
Luggage Lamp problem has been fixed.
Console Errors Fixed.
The problem of not having skin on the grilles has been fixed.
Windscreen Set Slots Lowered.
Shadow Problem Fixed.

V4
Signboard added.
Yellow reflection on the windscreen has been fixed.

V3
Added 4 interior cabin lights.
The interior has been detailed.
Collision issue fixed.
Added new skins.

V2
Fixed the door animations.
Added animation to upper windshield wipers.
Fixed interior light.
Added internal navigation.
Added new skins.
Added sidewall tire.
Chrome wheels polished.
Optimization done.
Who contributed;
Model:Can SKMN
Arrangement And Parts:Can SKMN
Convert and Edit: Mert İrşi and Digorlu Umut and his Team (Reputed Garage)
Last Convert: Enes Cakir
Skin Logo And Package: Yasin DEMIR

Credits: MARLON

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: KENWORTH PHANTOM v1.1 1.56.x ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 19, 2025

KENWORTH PHANTOM v1.1 1.56.x ATS

THIS IS A LITE VERSION

FULL version includes:
All accessories available.
All interior options with 2 gear levers.
Truck in truck browser.
Truck in quick jobs (3 options).
Metallic paints.
All skins available.

Get instructions.

KENWORTH PHANTOM v1.1 LITE ATS 1.56.x .

V1.1 changes:
Fixed possible game crash when open mods dealer.

v1.0 features:
Adaptation to ATS 1.56.x.
Must work O.K. from 1.51 to 1.56.x.
Mod totally reworked.
Lightened to improve FPS.
Fixed shadows.
Added missing wheel particles.
Added solid & metallic colours predefined options (METALLIC PAINTS ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Fixed all mirrors.
Fixed some model textures flickerings.
Fixed windshield & side windows reflections.
Fixed all known bugs & errors.
Deleted all innecessary files.
Reworked skins (SKINS ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Bike position changed (BIKE ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Added cabin accessories support.
Added Sis’L Megapack support (optional addon).
Added animated side windows.
Fixed wipers.
Fixed odometer.
Fixed dashboard display.
Reworked lights.
Reworked lightmasks.
Some changes on 3D models.
Truck added to truck browser (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Truck added to quick jobs (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).

Enjoy it.

Gamelog clean!
Please, inform about bugs/errors. Thank you.

MOD PROTECTED BY CREATIVE COMMONS LICENSE V4.0.
YOU CAN SHARE FREELY BUT ONLY USING THE ORIGINAL LINKS.
UPLOAD THE FILES TO OTHER SERVERS IS NOT PERMITTED.

Credits: Cyrus, TraviesoMan.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Better Flares v4.6.4 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 19, 2025

Better Flares v4.6.4 1.56 ETS2

Changes v4.6.4:
– Fixed missing textures for AI vehicles in Traffic Addon
– Slightly increased tail & brake lights intensity (tail lights were 5, now 6; brake lights were 60 now 65)
– Improved compatibility with Sound Fixes Pack mod

– Completely reworked flares
– Realistic headlights patterns with 6 different colors (up to 140 modded trucks supported)
– Modified SCS AI traffic with 9 headlights color variants and 2 red/brake signals in Traffic Addon
– Dimmed street lamps in City Lights Addon

Credits: Aveliumar

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Waze Style GPS Navigation Colors – Realistic Dark Mode v1.6 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 19, 2025

Waze Style GPS Navigation Colors – Realistic Dark Mode v1.6 1.56 ETS2

Tired of the default ETS2 GPS colors that look outdated or too bright for night drives?
This mod transforms your GPS and map visuals into a modern, sleek dark-mode interface inspired by Waze and Google Maps night themes. Whether you’re hauling across Europe at dusk or managing fleets under moonlight, this mod improves clarity, realism, and comfort—without sacrificing immersion.

FEATURES
Dark-mode roads and map backgrounds for reduced eye strain
Realistic cyan-blue navigation paths that pop clearly, even at night
Matches Waze-style route highlights, arrows, and prefab zones
Works across: Advisor map, World Map, Job Market, Fleet Manager
Full prefab color rework for both discovered & undiscovered areas
Vibrant green crossroad arrows (Waze-inspired)

TECHNICAL INFO
Compatible with ETS2 1.54+
Can be combined with map mods like Promods, RusMap, etc.
Plug-and-play .sii color override – no performance impact

INSTALLATION
Drop the .scs file into your mod folder.
Enable the mod in your Mod Manager.
Place near the top of your load order for best compatibility.

Credits: kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Realistic Rain & Thunder Sounds v9.0 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 19, 2025

Realistic Rain & Thunder Sounds v9.0 1.56 ETS2

Changelog
– Compatible With 1.56.x
– Improved Rain & Drops
– Other Tweaks And Improvements

– Compatible To Work With ETS Game Version 1.56.x
– Realistic Lightning Bolts
– Realistic Water
– Realistic Sea, Rivers, Lakes, Beachs etc
– Realistic Thunder Sounds (Over 40 HQ Sounds)
– Realistic Thunder Sounds Inside Cabin & Outside Cabin Of The Truck.
– Realistic Rain Drops And Windshield Effects.
– Realistic Rain
– Realistic Rain Effects
– Realistic Rain Sounds
– Realistic Lightning
– Realistic Lightning Bolts
– Rain Particles/Spray Wheels (Truck & AI Traffic)
– Custom Truck Outside View – Further Zoom Out (Keyboard Key 2) Zoom In / Out (Mouse Wheel)
